text: Nicolae Grigore (born 12 March 1975 in Sibiu) is a former Romanian football player. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Sportspeople from Sibiu Category:Romanian footballers Category:FC Spartak Vladikavkaz players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Romanian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:FC Unirea Alba Iulia players Category:FC SKA-Khabarovsk players Category:CSU Voința Sibiu players Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders
title: Nicolae Grigore (footballer, born 1975)
